lines.text: Russian dentists make pretty good dentures.

[dying]
American... tell me... tell me about Disneyland.

[crying]
They got tons of popcorn there. All you gotta do is go climb a tree to go eat it. And there's cotton candy. Mountains of it. And chocolate milk, and malts. And there's a genie. A magic genie. And he can't wait to grant your wishes.

[to Ransom]
Hey, hero. Remember that Vietnamese village? With that boy called Lao? Nice boy, wasn't he. That's why I decided to save him for last. He had such fragile bones.
This isn't torture anymore, Jakoda. You can't leave him in a cell with a rotting corpse. It's inhuman.
Ransom is strong. He can take physical pain. It's the mental stress we are after.

[learning that Michael Ransom has been captured]
Now they'll torture his ass.
Out Father who art in heaven!
Any similarity between the person's living or dead...
[Ransom throws Jakota's dentures directly to the ground on his right-hand side]
He's purely accidental. Yeah, very accidental. Like one of the million, maybe.
